Snorlax (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0142: Aerodactyl
Pokémon
#0144: Articuno →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Snorlax (TCG Pocket).

Snorlax has been featured on 39 different cards since it debuted in the Jungle expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Snorlax cards are normally Colorless-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Snorlax

Snorlax
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
